summary: Doctor Aitamaa is spending holiday with his family at their summer villa. He accidentally reads a letter that was meant to his wife. The letter is from another man. Aitamaa fallows his wife... See full summary »
cast: Tauno Palo|Gunvor Sandkvist|Helen Elde|Matti Oravisto|Risto Mäkelä|Uuno Montonen|Anton Soini|Paavo Hukkinen|Arttu Suuntala|Eila Pehkonen|Pertti Palo|Liana Kaarina|Tuukka Soitso|Pentti Auer|Jarno Hiilloskorpi|Martta Kinnunen|Osmo Lindeman|Toivo Mäkelä|Irja Rannikko|Rauha Rentola|Tommi Rinne|Unto Salminen|Tauno Söder|Hannes Veivo
title: Tulipunainen kyyhkynen
